mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_ID, CREW_ID, SENDER_USER_ID AS senderId, MESSAGE_TEXT AS content, SENT_AT AS sentAt FROM CREW_CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CREW_ID = #{crewId} ORDER BY SENT_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CREW_CHAT_MESSAGE ( CREW_ID, SENDER_USER_ID, MESSAGE_TEXT, SENT_AT ) VALUES ( #{crewId}, #{senderId}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
